thread.title: Little Mix’s Jesy Nelson cosies up to Towie’s Chris Clark after The BRIT Awards 2017 as they fuel romance rumours
thread.title_full: Little Mix’s Jesy Nelson cosies up to Towie’s Chris Clark after The BRIT Awards 2017 as they fuel romance rumours

author: jrobinson
title: Little Mix’s Jesy Nelson cosies up to Towie’s Chris Clark after The BRIT Awards 2017 as they fuel romance rumours
text:
TV Magazine Stay with me Little Mix’s Jesy Nelson cosies up to Towie’s Chris Clark after The BRIT Awards 2017 as they fuel romance rumours 
The Instagram picture comes days after Jesy was spotted sexy dancing near Chris in a Snapchat video By JILL ROBINSON, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 22nd February 2017, 11:43 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JESY Nelson and Towie’s Chris Clark have continued to fuel romance rumours as they posed for a cosy picture together at The BRIT Awards. 
The reality star took to Instagram on Wednesday night to share the snap of them together after Little Mix’s big night saw them win their first Brit Award and open the show in spectacular fashion. Instagram 5 Jesy Nelson and Chris Clark have fuelled romance rumours 
With his arm around Jesy’s neck and her arm snaked around his waist, the pair held hands as they smiled for the cameras. 
Chris captioned the shot: “I don’t want this girl to go back America tomorrow!” 
The picture lead shocked fans of the pair to simply comment “WTF”, as many of them wondered what the nature of their relationship was. PA:Press Association Jesy and her Little Mix bandmates had a big night at The BRIT Awards earlier in the evening, winning their first gong Snapchat 5 Jesy was caught dancing beside Chris Clark 
That night out came just weeks after they began following each other on Instagram.
